Package game

Class Item

java.lang.Object
game.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchaseable
public class Item extends Object implements Purchaseable
A single Item class, which contains the behviour for heal items, damage buff items, and full revives. Implements purchaseable so it can be bought and sold.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Item(String name, int price)
    Constructs an Item with a name and price, and sets healAmount and buffAmount to zero and isRevive to false, so the Item is initially not any type of item.

    • getMonstersUsableOn

      public ArrayList<Monster> getMonstersUsableOn(ArrayList<Monster> team)
      Filters a list of monsters, returning a list of those which this item may be used on (e.g. heal item not useable on monster at full health).
      Parameters:
      team - The initial ArrayList of Monster.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Monster, those of team which this item may be used on.

    • useItem

      public void useItem(Monster monster)
      Uses this item on the given monster, either healing the monster, calling Monster.rest(), or adding a damage buff to the monster.
      Parameters:
      monster - The Monster on which to use this item.
